snippet: To end an impasse and allow for elections, President Michel Martelly said that he would accept the recommendations of a commission that has called for the prime minister to resign.
abstract: Haitian Pres Michel Martelly says he will accept recommendations of commission calling for resignation of Prime Min Laurent Lamothe as country continues to try to recover from 2010 earthquake that has left it in an intensifying political crisis.

byline.contributor: Andre Paultre contributed from Port-au-Prince, Haiti.

lead_paragraph: To end an impasse and allow for elections, President Michel Martelly said that he would accept the recommendations of a commission that has called for the prime minister to resign.

headline.main: Haitian President May Drop His Premier
headline.print_headline: Haitian President May Drop His Premier
